name: Navegar al módulo Leave y verificar su carga
scenarioId: login:Navegar al módulo Leave y verificar su carga
methodName: Navegar al módulo Leave y verificar su carga

testSteps.description: Given que estoy en la página de "Leave"

exception.message:
Expected: an element that is visible
     but: no matching element found by [Leave menu option located with: //ul[contains(@class,'oxd-main-menu')]//li//span[normalize-space(text())='Leave']]

children.description: When la página se carga completamente
Then debo ver los filtros "From Date", "To Date", "Show Leave with Status", "Leave Type", "Employee Name", "Sub Unit", e "Include Past Employees"
And debo ver las columnas de la tabla "Date", "Employee Name", "Leave Type", "Leave Balance (Days)", "Number of Days", "Status", "Comments", y "Actions"
And si no hay registros, debo ver el mensaje "No Records Found"

userStory.narrative:
Como usuario del sistema OrangeHRM
  Quiero poder iniciar sesion con mis credenciales
  Para acceder al dashboard del sistema

title: Navegar al módulo Leave y verificar su carga

     but: no matching element found by [Leave menu option located with: //ul[contains(@class,'oxd-main-menu')]//li//span[normalize-space(text())='Leave']]
